parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE: The post includes the CMF number 11240002, indicating it is electoral propaganda material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE: The post explicitly refers to Hubert Thuma and Nicoleta Pauliuc, both candidates from the PNL party, and promotes their position on the ballot paper.  It directly mentions the PNL party and encourages voting for them. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE: This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The message is not a private communication but a public appeal to Ilfov voters. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE: The primary objective of the post is to persuade voters in Ilfov County to vote for Hubert Thuma and Nicoleta Pauliuc (PNL) in the parliamentary elections. The phrases "votăm pentru România modernă", "Ilfovenii votează PNL", and "poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot" clearly demonstrate an intention to influence the vote. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE: While the post contains some factual information (e.g., Ilfov's budget), its primary purpose is not journalistic. It lacks objectivity and is clearly biased towards promoting the PNL candidates. It does not present diverse viewpoints or engage in critical analysis.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE: The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's a structured campaign message promoting specific candidates and a political party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>572535765367817</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to specific PNL candidates, targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook campaign, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to choose the PNL candidates. The presence of the CMF number further confirms its nature as electoral propaganda.  The post's timing, close to election day, and its explicit call to vote for PNL candidates strengthen the case for it being electoral propaganda.  The argument that it discusses the candidates' roles outside the election is weak, as the main focus is clearly on the election itself.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Hubert Thuma</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Nicoleta Pauliuc</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Partidul Național Liberal, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 572535765367817), cu un buget de 500-599 RON, care promovează candidații PNL Hubert Thuma și Nicoleta Pauliuc, îndemnând la votul pentru aceștia și indicând poziția lor pe buletinul de vot. Postarea, care a generat între 10.000 și 15.000 de impresii și a avut o estimare a acoperirii de 500.000 - 1.000.000 de persoane, conține numărul CMF 11240002, indicând clar caracterul de propagandă electorală.  Efectul electoral este evident, având ca obiectiv influențarea votului în favoarea candidaților PNL.  Fraze precum "votăm pentru România modernă", "Ilfovenii votează PNL", și "poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot" demonstrează intenția clară de a influența votul.  Contact: pnl.ilfov@pnl.ro, +40765258996.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
